Introduction

Source: vignettes/introduction.Rmd
introduction.Rmd

When creating R markdown websites, I often find myself wanting to organise content into a nice-looking grid of links. For example, in a recent project I wanted something like this:

Starting R markdown

An introduction to R markdown. The target audience is a novice R user with no previous experience with markdown.

Starting ggplot2

An introduction to ggplot2. The target audience is a novice user with no previous experience with R or ggplot2.

Starting programming

This is primarily a tutorial on making generative art in R, but in doing so introduces core programming constructs and data structures. It is assumed the user has some previous experience with ggplot2.

The goal of bs4cards is to his task a little easier inside an R markdown document or website.

Enabling bootstrap 4

The bs4cards package takes its name from the “cards” system introduced in bootstrap version 4, and the package does not work for R markdown documents that rely on bootstrap version 3. To ensure that you are using bootstrap 4, you need to edit the YAML header for your document to specify which version of bootstrap you want to use. For example, here is the relevant section of YAML you might use in a simple R markdown site

output:
  html_document:
    theme:
      version: 4

This overrides the R markdown defaults to ensure that the output is built using boostrap 4.5 rather than an older version (boostrap 3.4) that doesn’t support cards.

To enable bootstrap 4 in a pkgdown site (such as this one), edit the _pkgdown.yml file to include the following

template:
  bootstrap: 4

(You may need to update to the development version of pkgdown to make this work!)

Basic cards

library(bs4cards)
card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute."
)
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image below is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.",
  image_align = "bottom"
)
My First Card

The image below is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

Card grids

kitty <- function( ...) {
  card(
    title = "A kitten card",
    image = sample_kitten(),
    text = sample_lorem(),
    ...
  )
}

kitty_list <- list(kitty(), kitty(), kitty(), 
                   kitty(), kitty(), kitty())

card_group(kitty_list)
A kitten card

Gracchum patrem non beatiorem fuisse quam fillum, cum alter stabilire rem publicam studuerit, alter evertere. Equidem e Cn. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

A kitten card

Nosti, credo, illud: Nemo pius est, qui pietatem-; Equidem e Cn. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Graece donan, Latine voluptatem vocant.

A kitten card

Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Vos autem cum perspicuis dubia debeatis illustrare, dubiis perspicua conamini tollere. Dolere malum est: in crucem qui agitur, beatus esse non potest.

A kitten card

Cur ipse Pythagoras et Aegyptum lustravit et Persarum magos adiit? Sed venio ad inconstantiae crimen, ne saepius dicas me aberrare; Nescio quo modo praetervolavit oratio.

A kitten card

Equidem e Cn. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Ut non sine causa ex iis memoriae ducta sit disciplina. His enim rebus detractis negat se reperire in asotorum vita quod reprehendat.

A kitten card

Et quod est munus, quod opus sapientiae? Nescio quo modo praetervolavit oratio. Honesta oratio, Socratica, Platonis etiam.

Headers and footers

list(kitty(footer = "Kitten A"), 
     kitty(footer = "Kitten B"), 
     kitty(footer = "Kitten C")) %>% 
  card_group()
A kitten card

Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Contemnit enim disserendi elegantiam, confuse loquitur. Quid de Platone aut de Democrito loquar?

Kitten A
A kitten card

Nobis aliter videtur, recte secusne, postea; Quorum sine causa fieri nihil putandum est. Et certamen honestum et disputatio splendida!

Kitten B
A kitten card

Sed emolumenta communia esse dicuntur, recte autem facta et peccata non habentur communia. Eam si varietatem diceres, intellegerem, ut etiam non dicente te intellego; Quam ob rem tandem, inquit, non satisfacit?

Kitten C
list(kitty(header = "Kitten A"), 
     kitty(header = "Kitten B"), 
     kitty(header = "Kitten C")) %>% 
  card_group()
Kitten A
A kitten card

Quasi vero, inquit, perpetua oratio rhetorum solum, non etiam philosophorum sit. Ita ne hoc quidem modo paria peccata sunt. Haec para/doca illi, nos admirabilia dicamus.

Kitten B
A kitten card

Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Dempta enim aeternitate nihilo beatior Iuppiter quam Epicurus; Quid de Platone aut de Democrito loquar?

Kitten C
A kitten card

Si quicquam extra virtutem habeatur in bonis. Ergo ita: non posse honeste vivi, nisi honeste vivatur? Quid est, quod ab ea absolvi et perfici debeat?

Customising card width

card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.",
  width = bs_col(medium = 4) 
)
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card( title = "My First Card", image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200", text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.", width = bs_col(medium = 6) )
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card( title = "My First Card", image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200", text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.", width = bs_col(large = 6) )
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.
